name: Hyperion IV
description:
In this demo version the game will not save your progress.

Get the full version on Google Play for a more awesome experience!

Stuck in a menu? Press Esc to go back one step. (This makes more sense on a mobile device)

Hop into your spaceship and fly out to the Stardust belts!

The more Stardust you collect the more powerful space rockets you can purchase, and if you bet some of the Stardust you have already earned you can quickly multiply your profit!

But beware of rogue asteroids and alien creatures. The treacherous Vitruvians are cruising around out in the belts as well, not to mention the mysterious Bwlorgs.
